name: IBEE Hosting
tagline: Fast, affordable and reliable Dedicated Hosting
description:
BEE has been providing fast and affordable hosting to enterprises since 2006 in India. IBEE Hosting is part of XBT Holding and other flagship products of XBT like Servers.com, Webzilla etc. As a subsidiary of servers.com IBEE Hosting provides affordable Dedicated Hosting solutions in India. We offer best in class Dedicated Servers from Dell and Super Micro. Our infrastructure is a Tier IV facility with round the clock server monitoring team available for any hands on support.
We also offer Cloud Hosting in USA and CDN services for high performance and scalable server requirements. We provide Enterprise Level Hosting solutions and Proactive Support services to the various Industry sectors like Web Design & Development, Media & Entertainment, E-commerces, Software, ERP and many more.
